name: Drag and Drop - Cases when drag and drop should not activate

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
Drag and Drop - Cases when drag and drop should not activate
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
Attempt to:
  1. Drag a selection of highlighted text over Center pane, LHS and RHS
  2. Drag a channel name over Center pane, LHS and RHS
  3. Drag a file onto the LHS
inline.expectedResult: • Drag and Drop UI does not appear

customFields.Related ticket(s): Drag and drop UI appears when dragging images — MM-19929
customFields.Important notes about this step: You can find test files here: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1xGCy3tp9A_WxOfdgAzBHzrqJ1WCyfSjW
